parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
Character references:
- Eve (v 2.0) — Full-character reference images:
  - Eve (v 2.0) Standing back view — Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.

Scene references:
- Garden of Eden — Scene reference images:
  - Garden of Eden — Usage: Use this image for scene layout, environment, and lighting; keep character identity from character references.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration
- Genre / subject focus: Historical

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed
- Line weight: Thin Clean Lines
- Line quality: Sketchy / Rough

Color & Lighting:
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium
- Lighting style: Ambient / Environmental Light

Rendering Technique:
- Shading: Cel Shading
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Composition & Camera:
- Camera style: Cinematic Framing
- Focal length / lens feel: Normal Lens Feel

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Atmosphere / environment feel: Beginning-of-time, trees, rocks, bushes

Caricature & Exaggeration:
- Exaggeration level: Moderate caricature
- Head-to-body exaggeration: Slightly enlarged head
- Eye exaggeration: Slightly enlarged eyes
- Mouth exaggeration: Slightly emphasized mouth
- Eyebrow exaggeration: Slightly emphasized eyebrows
- Jaw / chin exaggeration: Slightly emphasized jaw or chin
- Elastic shape distortion: Slightly softened forms
- Intentional asymmetry: Moderate hand-drawn asymmetry
- Silhouette exaggeration: Slightly stylized silhouette
- Expression exaggeration: Slightly expressive
- Likeness preservation: Very strong likeness preservation
- Line style: Expressive hand-drawn lines

CHARACTERS

CHARACTER — Eve (v 2.0)
Core Identity:
- Age / apparent age range: Early 30s
- Gender identity or presentation: Woman
- Pronouns: she/her
- Species / race: Human
- Ethnicity / cultural cues: Northern European Features
- Height category: Average Height
- Body type: Toned
- Archetype: Sage

Facial Structure:
- Face shape: Diamond
- Jawline: Short Jawline
- Cheek structure: High Cheekbones
- Forehead proportion: Balanced Proportion
- Eye shape: Almond
- Eye size: Large Eyes
- Eye color: Green
- Eyebrow shape: Soft Arched
- Nose shape: Aquiline Nose
- Mouth shape: Medium Lips
- Chin: Tapered Chin

Hair:
- Hair color: Brown
- Hair texture: Wavy
- Hair length: Very Long
- Parting: No Visible Part
- Volume: Extra Voluminous
- Hair silhouette: Long Wavy

Skin:
- Skin tone: Medium Brown
- Undertone: Golden

Physique:
- Overall body shape: Hourglass
- Shoulder width: Average
- Waist definition: Tapered
- Torso length: Average
- Leg length: Average
- Musculature: Toned

Character Lore:
- Backstory summary: Eve, mythological first woman
- Motivations: Curiosity / Discovery
- Strengths: Observant
- Flaws: Naive, Overly Trusting, Overly Idealistic
- Role in story: Navigator / Strategist

SCENE
Core Scene Identity:
- Scene name: Garden of Eden
- Setting type: Outdoor
- Genre / world flavor: Fantasy
- Time period / era: Ancient / Antiquity
- Narrative role: Establishing Environment
- Environmental influences: The-very-beginning

Spatial Layout & Environment Geometry:
- Height complexity: Varied Heights (uneven terrain, tall shelves)

Lighting & Illumination:
- Time of day: Afternoon
- Primary light source: Sunlight
- Light direction: Side light (left)
- Lighting intensity: 50
- Shadow style: Soft shadows
- Light temperature: Warm (yellow/orange)

Camera & Composition:
- Default camera angle: Eye-level
- Default shot type: Extreme close-up
- Default focal length: Natural (~50mm, human-like)
- Composition rules: Centered / symmetry
- Perspective style: One-point perspective
- Allowed camera movements: Pan left, Pan right, Tilt down, Tilt up, Dolly in (move forward)

Atmosphere & Environmental Effects:
- Weather type: Clear / No weather effects

TASK
close up shot of 3/4 standing back view of Eve petting large serpent hanging from the tree.

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.

Image reference: Eve (v 2.0) Standing back view — Full-character reference images.
Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.

Image reference: Garden of Eden — Scene reference images.
Usage: Use this image for scene layout, environment, and lighting; keep character identity from character references.
